tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mediator_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  mediator_name VARCHAR(50),
  recommendation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE mediator_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    case_id INT,
    mediator_name VARCHAR(50),
    report_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    recommendation_date DATE,
    mediator_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE child_custody_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name VARCHAR(50),
    parent1_name VARCHAR(50),
    parent2_name VARCHAR(50),
    case_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE mediator_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_title TEXT,
  report_date DATE,
  mediator_name TEXT,
  client_name TEXT,
  report_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE recommendations (
  recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  recommendation_text TEXT,
  recommended_actions TEXT,
  due_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES mediator_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE dispute_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  mediator_id INT,
  case_details TEXT,
  status TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (client_id) REFERENCES clients(client_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (mediator_id) REFERENCES mediators(mediator_id)
);
